text.more:
A network graph of as many of the deaths as I could account for in George R. R. Martin's series A Song of Ice and Fire. Created in Gephi and exported using the Sigma.js plugin from the Oxford Internet Institute. The data is from A Wiki of Ice and Fire.

A few notes on decisions:
(1) When characters had conflicting/changing allegiances, I chose the region they're from
(2) When possible, I avoided using a generic group (e.g. Bolton soldiers) and attributed the death to the person who ordered it (e.g. Ramsay Snow)
(4) Red arrow indicates direct responsibility, green arrow indicates indirect responsibility
text.intro: most of the deaths in A Song of Ice and Fire
text.title: Character Deaths in Game of Thrones
